trans-unit.source: Specifies the location in which theme dictionaries are stored for an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 指定的主题字典存储的程序集的位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.ThemeInfoAttribute"></xref> class and creates an attribute that defines theme dictionary locations for types in an assembly.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.ThemeInfoAttribute"></xref>类，并创建的程序集中定义的类型的主题字典位置属性。

trans-unit.source: When the `themeDictionaryLocation` is <xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionaryLocation>, you can include files such as Luna.NormalColor.xaml.
trans-unit.target: 当`themeDictionaryLocation`是<xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionaryLocation>，可以包括如 Luna.NormalColor.xaml 的文件。</xref:System.Windows.ResourceDictionaryLocation>

trans-unit.source: These names are defined by the system theme files, which include the following.
trans-unit.target: 这些名称由系统主题文件，其中包括以下定义。

trans-unit.source: Classic – "Classic" Windows 9x/2000 look on Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 经典 –"经典"Windows 9x x / 2000年在 Windows XP 上的外观。

trans-unit.source: Luna.NormalColor - Default blue theme on Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: Luna.NormalColor-在 Windows XP 上的默认蓝色主题。

trans-unit.source: Luna.Homestead – Olive theme on Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: Luna.Homestead – Windows XP 上橄榄主题。

trans-unit.source: Luna.Metallic – Silver theme on Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: Luna.Metallic – Windows XP 上银级主题。

trans-unit.source: Royale.NormalColor – Default theme on Windows XP Media Center Edition.
trans-unit.target: Royale.NormalColor – Windows XP Media Center Edition 上的默认主题。

trans-unit.source: Aero.NormalColor – Default theme on Windows Vista
trans-unit.target: Aero.NormalColor – 在 Windows Vista 上的默认主题
特定于主题的资源的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of generic, not theme-specific, resources.
trans-unit.target: 泛型、 不主题特定于资源的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of generic, not theme specific, resources.
trans-unit.target: 泛型、 不特定于主题和资源的位置。

trans-unit.source: The location of theme specific resources.
